This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: A white ball of light made strange movements over my house.
divs: Sighting Detailsi was on the computer and my sister called me out because she thought her mom was seeing something weird in the sky so i walked out poolside and there she was looking up and syaing something i said were is it she said"it gotta be a satellite cause it made an S shape and it moving so fast" and i look up and see a ball of bright white light and it look like a planet in the night sky but alot bigger and its started to curve to the north west (it was heading west) and i thought i should video tape this because no one will believe me so a i ran back in and got the camcorder a stood off my deck and video taped for about 4 seconds a big white ball of light i reviewed it this morning and theres no landing lights or and y structure to it theres just the ball of light i basically remebered everything i could it had to be a piloted craft because it changed direction and it didnt have a the comet tail so it wasnt stuff burning in the atmosphere and there was no apparent structure to it at all if you would like the video just email me and also it seemed rely high in the air like it was a satellite thats the only thing i havent rulled out but satellites dont change direction ass much as this thing did or make S shape patterns in the sky at least i dont think they do but i dont have the direction change in the video a just have it heading of into the distance and u cant rely see that
